definition: to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess

sentences.english: She admitted having stolen that car.

sentences.chinese: 他出其不意地使我招認了。

sentences.english: The police surprised the thief into confessing.
sentences.chinese: 警察出其不意地使小偷招認了。

sentences.english: The police could not browbeat him into confessing.
sentences.chinese: 警察怎樣威逼他也沒法使他招認。

sentences.english: His confession was strong-armed by the police.
sentences.chinese: 他的口供是警方逼迫招認的。

sentences.english: Nina tells him that Jamey has confessed to her participation in the plot.
sentences.chinese: 尼娜告訴他，傑克已經招認了有份參與這個陰謀。

sentences.english: Weak from hunger and illness, he prepared to make a full confession.
sentences.chinese: 他又餓又病，虛弱不堪，打算一一招認。
